price: (Onlara uyanlar ise:) Hayır! Asıl size rahat yüzü yok! Onu siz bize sundunuz derler. Ne kötü kalma yeridir! derler.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum antum qaddamtumūhu lanā fabi'sa al-qarāru
